settings.tableSortMetricName: Total number of documents removed from the collection per second using the ttl index

query.alias: Total number of documents removed from the collection per second using the ttl index
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`ttl_deletes_per_sec`) AS `Total number of documents removed from the collection per second using the ttl index`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Number of documents removed from the collection per second using the ttl index in background process
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`ttl_passes_per_sec`) AS `Number of documents removed from the collection per second using the ttl index in background process`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

settings.tableSortMetricName: Percentage of dirty pages in memory

units.key: Percentage of dirty pages in memory
units.name: Percentage of dirty pages in memory

query.alias: Percentage of dirty pages in memory
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`percent_cache_dirty`) AS `Percentage of dirty pages in memory`) { `host` = '#{host}' }
M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`total_keys_scanned`) AS `Total number of keys scanned`) { `host` = '#{host}' }
M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`total_docs_scanned`) AS `Total number of documents scanned`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Number of cursors not timed out
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`cursor_no_timeout`) AS `Number of cursors not timed out`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Current length of waiting read lock queue
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`queued_reads`) AS `Current length of waiting read lock queue`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Current length of waiting write lock queue
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`queued_writes`) AS `Current length of waiting write lock queue`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Active clients currently requesting read locks
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`active_reads`) AS `Active clients currently requesting read locks`) { `host` = '#{host}' }

query.alias: Active clients currently requesting write locks
query.q: M::`mongodb`:(AVG(`active_writes`) AS `Active clients currently requesting write locks`) { `host` = '#{host}' }
